Text: RE Interview with Enron Corp Research Cc Shirley Thanks for your letter and invitation Next week we have a spring break at UH so I will be pretty flexible Is next Tuesday fine Almost any time If not any other day next week will work for me Starting March I will teach again and it will be harder but not impossible to find a good time for interview with Enron Adam Original Message From mailto Sent marca To Subject Interview with Enron Corp Research Good morning Adam The Enron Corp Research Group would like to conduct an informal interview with you at your convenience Please give me some dates and times that would be convenient to sometime within the next weeks and I will coordinate an interview schedule I look forward to hearing from you very soon Best regards Shirley Crenshaw Administrative Coordinator Enron Corp Research email Forwarded by Vince J KaminskiHOUECT on AM Adam Bobrowski on PM To cc Subject resume Dear Mr Kaminski as a follow up to your oral communication with my friend Tom Ware I would like to express my interest in working for your company Enron Please find enclosed my resume and Curriculum Vitae If you need additional data please feel free to call me at Home or Office or email me at or Yours sincerely Adam Bobrowski See attached file cvbobrowskips See attached file bobrowskiresumedoc
